Reviews.Title: Workable
Reviews.Author: Selina Rochelle Irby
Reviews.Content: I bought this as my first professional camera.  It is a great camera but the large telephoto lense isn't compatiable with Canon auto-focus so you are trying to focus and take the shot all in one.  The tri-pod is cheap and with the big lense and the camera it tips over very easy.  The back pack buckel broke in the first two weeks of having it.  Now I would be these items independent instead of thinking this is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon eos 7 d
Reviews.Author: Leonel moreno
Reviews.Content: Great package, items arrive on time, i love the cammera, i have used for 1 year already no problems at all, i recommend the vendor.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy
Reviews.Author: Ally
Reviews.Content: Received my order promptly and I am very pleased about the product. I recieved everything listed and am enjoying using my camera!!! I'm still trying to figure everything out with using it, but I love it!

Extra High Capacity Li-Ion Battery + 6 Piece Accessory Kit + 3 Year Warranty Repair Contract
